thread.title: NUTLEY IRISH AMERICAN ASSOC
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by NUTLEY IRISH AMERICAN ASSOC

author: NUTLEY IRISH AMERICAN ASSOC
title: NUTLEY IRISH AMERICAN ASSOC
text: We use Hodges almost every year for rosettes for our local St. Patrick's Day Parade and we love them. They are a pleasure to deal with, the price is unbeatable and the quality is superb. We look forward to continuing to work with Hodges in the years to come.
